name: ViveHealth
0:
”Alexa, ask Vive Health to check eligibility status.”
”Alexa, ask Vive Health what's my eligibility status?”
”Alexa, ask Vive Health to check claim status.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vive health
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Providers, checking patient eligibility or claim payment status can be as easy as asking "what's the weather?" or "get me directions". Enable the Vive Health skill and simply ask Vive "is my patient eligible" - no waiting on hold, no clumsy two-handed number entry. Find out "has my claim been paid yet" just by asking Vive health - when it was paid and how much was paid. No more guesswork or stale information, Vive Health ensures eligibility and payment status is up-to-the-minute.

If the carrier or TPA is not yet a Vive Health partner, ask them to enable Vive Health today!

About Vive and Viveka Health:
Viveka Health is a technology provider to employers, insurers, and TPAs that revolutionizes challenging processes in healthcare with cutting-edge tech solutions. Our Vive family of smartphone apps and voice-enabled skills reduces friction and costs across the healthcare ecosystem.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
